message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm interested in purchasing the product for a lower price. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than your latest offer. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $13,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than your latest offer. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
